en: She was present at the party.
She filled the vase with water.
She has been cherishing that flower.
She likes the singer.
She sang the song softly.
She asked about the location of the house.
She went to the house several times.
zh: 她去了那所房子好几次。

en: She served the family for twenty years.
zh: 她为这个家庭服务了二十年。

en: She came to like the house.
zh: 她开始喜欢上了这所房子。

en: She can't bear the noise.
She took down the speech in shorthand.
She designed beautiful costumes for the movie.
zh: 她为这部电影设计了漂亮的服装。

en: She claims the inheritance.
She was elected chairman of the committee.
She has been asked to sit on the committee.
She blanched at the bad news.
zh: 听到这个坏消息，她脸色苍白。

en: She paid seven percent interest on the loan.
zh: 她为这笔贷款支付了百分之七的利息。

en: She gave a big pull on the rope.
She took first prize in the race.
zh: 她在比赛中获得了一等奖。

en: She made jam from the apples.
She fastened the medal on the lapel with a pin.
zh: 她用别针把奖章别在翻领上。

en: She made reservations for a room at the hotel.
zh: 她在酒店预订了一个房间。

en: She made a reservation for a room at the hotel.
zh: 她在酒店预订了一个房间。

en: She got carried away watching the boxing match.
zh: 她看拳击比赛看得入了迷。

en: She recognized the brooch as the one she had lost a few months before.
zh: 她认出这枚胸针是几个月前她丢失的那一枚。

en: She gave the blouse a quick wash.
zh: 她把衬衫快速地洗了一下。

en: She drank the beer down.
She solved the puzzle with ease.
zh: 她轻而易举地解开了谜题。

en: She was wearing proper clothes for the party.
zh: 她穿着得体的衣服参加聚会。

en: She tried on the party dress.
She was surprised at the news.
zh: 她对这个消息感到很惊讶。

en: She felt like crying when she heard the news.
zh: 听到这个消息，她很想哭。

en: She felt like crying after hearing that news.
zh: 听了那个消息后，她很想哭。

en: She burst into tears when she heard the news.
zh: 听到这个消息，她突然哭了。

en: She walked about in search of the dress.
zh: 她四处走动寻找那件连衣裙。

en: She bought the dress on impulse.
zh: 她一时冲动买了那件连衣裙。

en: She could hardly keep from laughing when she saw the dress.
zh: 当她看到那件连衣裙时，她差点没忍住笑出来。

en: Her eyes settled on the dress.
zh: 她的目光落在那件连衣裙上。

en: She chose a scarf to wear with the dress.
zh: 她选了一条围巾来搭配那件连衣裙。

en: She picked out the shoes that match the dress.
zh: 她挑选了和那件连衣裙相配的鞋子。

en: She is pleased with the dress.
zh: 她对那件连衣裙很满意。

en: She did not buy the dress, which she liked very much.
zh: 她没有买那件她非常喜欢的连衣裙。

en: She played an important part in the drama.
zh: 她在剧中扮演了重要的角色。

en: She was cooking dinner at that time.
At that time, she was bathing in the sun.
zh: 那时，她正在享受日光浴。

en: She was sunbathing at that time.
She was washing the dishes then.
She has changed a lot since then.
zh: 从那以后，她改变了很多。

en: She worked hard so as to pass the test.
zh: 她努力学习为了通过考试。

en: She was fascinated by that Chinese dress.
zh: 她被那件中国旗袍深深吸引住了。

en: She denied having taken part in the scheme.
zh: 她否认参与了这项计划。

en: She took part in the contest.
She won the contest.
She was then more beautiful than she is now.
She wrote about it in her diary.
zh: 她在日记里写了这件事。

en: She gave it her personal attention.
She had no rule of thumb about it, but she got it right every time.
zh: 她对此没有什么经验法则，但每次都做对了。

en: She acted as if she knew nothing about it.
She was fined 10 dollars for that.
She is far from being pleased about it and she is very angry.
zh: 她一点也不高兴，而且非常生气。

en: She divided the cake into six pieces.
She has something to do with the group.
She was admitted to the club.
She was barred from the club.
She took care of the poor little bird.
zh: 她照顾了那只可怜的小鸟。

en: She hung the calendar on the wall.
She need not have paid the money.
She gave considerable thought to what to do with the money.
zh: 她认真考虑了如何处理这笔钱。

en: She spread the gossip all over the town.
zh: 她把流言蜚语传遍了整个城镇。

en: She tried to prevent the rumor from spreading.
No sooner had the idea occurred to her than she put it into action.
zh: 她一想到这个主意，就立刻付诸行动。

en: She had gone there ten years before.
She won the one hundred meter race.
She played a sonata.
She softly stole out of the room.
She whispered it in my ear.
zh: 她在我的耳边悄悄地说了。

en: Is she anywhere about?
She denied having been there.
She must go there.
She did not go there.
She went there by herself.
She regrets having never been there.
She lived there about five years.
zh: 她在那里住了大约五年。

en: She stayed there for several days.
She often sits there reading a book.
She insisted on going there.
She lived there for years.
She was alone there.
She made herself known to the company.
zh: 她让公司的人认识了她。

en: She introduced herself to the people who were there.
zh: 她向在场的人介绍了自己。

en: It happened that he saw her there.
She dwelt on the miserable days she spent there.
zh: 她沉湎于她在那里度过的悲惨日子。

en: She said that she had seen such and such there.
zh: 她说她在那儿看到了这样那样的事情。

en: She thought to the contrary.
She didn't think so.
She may have said so.
Such an idea is abhorrent to her.
She is inquisitive, but I like her none the worse.
zh: 她很好奇，但我并不因此更不喜欢她。

en: She said that she was eager to go there.
She was busy with her knitting.
She knows nothing about the birds and the bees.
zh: 她对男女之事一窍不通。

en: As head of the sales team she reports only to the managing director.
zh: 作为销售团队的负责人，她只向总经理汇报。

en: She was taken in by the salesman's smooth manner of talking.
zh: 她被那个销售员的花言巧语给骗了。

en: She was taken in by the salesman.
She pulled her sweater over her head.
zh: 她把毛衣从头上脱了下来。

en: She fell asleep with her sweater on.
She pulled her sweater on.
She put her sweater on.
She put on her sweater.
She lives in an expensive style.
She is a second-rate singer at best.
zh: 她充其量只是个二流歌手。

en: She will pay 50 dollars at most.
I thought she was 30 at most.
She is eighteen at most.
She was very nearly run over by a truck.
She is more thin than slender.
zh: 她与其说是苗条，不如说是瘦弱。

en: She gave a ready answer.
I hear she is a secretary to Mr Smith.
zh: 我听说她是史密斯先生的秘书。

en: I hear that she's Mr. Smith's secretary.
zh: 我听说她是史密斯先生的秘书。

en: She has to take in the waist of her pants a bit.
zh: 她得把裤子的腰围改小一点。

en: She is devoted to sport.
She is bad at sports.
She walked slowly for fear she should slip.
She walked slowly so she wouldn't slip.
zh: 她走得很慢，这样就不会滑倒了。

en: She bundled all her dresses into the suitcase.
zh: 她把所有的连衣裙都塞进了手提箱里。

en: She keeps a record of everything she buys.
zh: 她把买的每一样东西都记录下来。

en: She turned down every proposal.
She takes every circumstance into account.
zh: 她把每一种情况都考虑在内。

en: She depends on her husband for everything.
zh: 她一切都依靠她的丈夫。

en: She can speak Spanish, much more English.
zh: 她会说西班牙语，更不用说英语了。

en: She got wet to the skin.
She stirred the soup with a spoon.
She stirred her coffee with a spoon.
She won first prize in the speech contest.
zh: 她在演讲比赛中获得了一等奖。

en: She has a wonderful personality.
She gave me a lovely watch, but I lost it.
zh: 她给了我一块漂亮的手表，但我把它弄丢了。

en: She is a wonderful woman.
She gave me charming embroideries.
zh: 她给了我迷人的刺绣品。

en: She is a wonderful wife.
She gave birth to a fine healthy baby.
zh: 她生了一个健康的好宝宝。

en: She dressed herself quickly.
She quickly shut the kitten into a basket.
zh: 她迅速地把小猫关进篮子里。

en: She turned around quickly.
She is much the tallest girl.
She's by far the tallest girl.
She was suspected of being a spy.
She is unable to cope with stress.
She had wonderful food and, what was more, she was given a New year's gift.
zh: 她吃了很棒的食物，而且，更重要的是，她还收到了新年礼物。

en: She ran over her lines once before she went on stage.
zh: 她在上台前把台词过了一遍。

en: She is singing a song on the stage.
She kept conversation on a formal plane.
zh: 她始终保持着正式的谈话方式。

en: She had returned home long before.
She kept quiet.
She lay in bed all the time.
She has always lived in Otaru.
She kept on asking me questions the whole time.
zh: 她一直不停地问我问题。

en: She kept crying all the time.
I hear she has been absent from school.
zh: 我听说她一直没来上学。

en: She kept smiling all the time.
She folded napkins all the way.
The whole time she kept weaving the napkin.
She never lets you forget her clean-cut image.
zh: 她总是让你记住她干练的形象。

en: She has completely recovered from her illness.
She has totally changed her character.
She stopped crying altogether.
Do you think she can handle her staff?
zh: 你认为她能管理好她的员工吗？

en: She has no figure.
Because she has a good figure, whatever she wears suits her.
zh: 因为她身材好，所以穿什么都好看。

en: She has good style, so she looks good in anything she wears.
zh: 她很有品味，所以穿什么都好看。

en: She has a good figure.
She's an eye-opener.
She's not half attractive.
She lives a solitary life in a remote part of Scotland.
zh: 她在苏格兰偏远地区过着孤独的生活。

en: She is able to skate.
She can skate.
Will she get well soon?
She will come soon.
She cottoned to him soon.
She began to like him right away.
She liked him right off.
She is a poor sailor.
She set about her homework at once.
She proposed that a doctor should be called in immediately.
She came at once.
She easily flames up.
She will be here in no time.
She wrote me back soon.
I think she will come back soon.
She easily catches cold.
She catches colds easily.
She recognized him at once as the stranger in her dream.
zh: 她立刻认出他就是梦中的陌生人。

en: She lost no time in starting to work on new project.
zh: 她立即开始着手新项目。

en: It is important that she should leave at once.
zh: 她立即离开是很重要的。

en: She remarried soon.
She said she must leave at once.
She wanted to get married immediately.
I'm sure that she will come back soon.
zh: 我确信她很快就会回来。

en: She will be along soon.
She is readily accessible to flattery.
She lives quite close by.
She left here right away.
She wired she was coming soon.
zh: 她发电报说她很快就来。

en: The scandal nearly wrecked her career.
zh: 这丑闻差点毁了她的事业。

en: She likes dancing in a disco better than skiing.
zh: 她喜欢在迪斯科跳舞胜过滑雪。

en: She can both ski and skate.
It is said that she is an expert in skiing.
She does not know how to ski.
She is good at skiing.
She is great at skiing.
She is a clerk in the supermarket.
She went shopping at a supermarket.
She bought a Hoover at the supermarket.
zh: 她在超市买了一个胡佛吸尘器。

en: She bought a vacuum cleaner at the supermarket.
zh: 她在超市买了一个真空吸尘器。

en: She behaved quite foolishly.
She seems to have had a very hard time.
zh: 她似乎经历了一段非常艰难的时期。

en: She pressed the switch.
She asked Shinji to take Rei's ID-card to her the next day.
zh: 她让真嗣第二天把丽的身份证带给她。

en: She was in a silk dress.
zh: 她穿着一件丝绸连衣裙。

en: She put up an umbrella against a scorching sun.
zh: 她撑起伞来遮挡炎炎烈日。

en: She admires John for his courage.
She will grow on John.
zh: 她会逐渐让约翰喜欢上她。

en: She denied John's having helped the lost boy.
zh: 她否认约翰帮助过那个迷路的孩子。

en: She thought that John had loved her.
She knows that John loved her.
She knew that John loved her.
She indulged in a fit of temper.
She died of shock.
It gave her quite a shock, and she didn't want to talk about anything for a while. I think it'll be a while before she's back to normal.
zh: 这给了她很大的打击，她有一段时间什么都不想说。我想她要过一段时间才能恢复正常。

en: It was such a shock to her that she collapsed.
zh: 她受到的打击太大了，以至于晕倒了。

en: She went mad because of the shock.
zh: 她因为受到惊吓而发疯了。

en: She got over a shock.
zh: 她从惊吓中恢复过来了。

en: She looked in at the show window.
She can't cook well.
She stopped looking at the show window.
She is a natural to play the part of Juliet.
zh: 她天生适合扮演朱丽叶这个角色。

en: She was wearing a gown of satin.
She kept on talking.
She tends to talk too much.
She is interested in jazz.
She likes jazz, and I do, too.
zh: 她喜欢爵士乐，我也喜欢。

en: She likes jazz, and so do I.
She ended up in the hospital.
She flew to Europe by way of Siberia.
zh: 她经西伯利亚飞往欧洲。

en: For a while she did nothing but stare at me.
zh: 有一段时间她什么也没做，只是盯着我看。

en: She stared at me for a while.
She made up her mind to stay with us for a while.
zh: 她下定决心和我们一起住一段时间。

en: She was always staring at me for the time being.
zh: 在那段时间里，她总是盯着我看。

en: She was happy for some time.
She pondered the question for a while.
zh: 她思考了一会儿这个问题。

en: She hurried across the lawn.
She is often late for school on Mondays.
zh: 她星期一上学经常迟到。

en: She assumes an air of modesty.
zh: 她装出一副谦虚的样子。

en: She was a bundle of jealousy.
She held her hands tightly over her ears.
She looked at me in a deliberate way and left the meeting room.
zh: 她故意地看了我一眼，然后离开了会议室。

en: She's a tough woman.
She's a stubborn woman.
She's a determined woman.
She became seasick in rough seas.
zh: 她在波涛汹涌的海上晕船了。

en: She was in a hurry to go home.
She was eager to go home.
She was impatient to see her family.
zh: 她迫不及待地想见到她的家人。

en: She is eager to live in Australia.
She soon adjusted to his way of life.
zh: 她很快就适应了他的生活方式。

en: She soon adjusted herself to village life.
zh: 她很快就适应了乡村生活。

en: She is even more beautiful.
She called me many terrible things.
zh: 她骂了我很多难听的话。

en: She heaped her plate with salad.
zh: 她在盘子里堆满了沙拉。

en: She went out without saying good-bye.
She went out without saying goodbye.
She hung up without saying good-bye.
zh: 她没说再见就挂断了电话。

en: She said goodbye.
She cried her heart out.
She wondered where Sam was and what he was doing.
zh: 她想知道萨姆在哪里，在做什么。

en: She lived a lonely life.
She always comforted herself with music when she was lonely.
zh: 她寂寞的时候总是用音乐安慰自己。

en: She is neatly dressed.
She doesn't like soccer.
She gets angry at trifles.
She looks very young as against her husband.
zh: 和她丈夫相比，她看起来非常年轻。

en: She is in a mood.
They say she and her husband can't agree on anything.
zh: 据说她和她的丈夫什么都谈不拢。

en: Is she a computer programmer?
Isn't she a computer programmer?
She won no less than ten thousand dollars in a competition.
zh: 她在比赛中赢得了不少于一万美元的奖金。

en: She tried to obtain a ticket for the concert.
zh: 她试图获得一张音乐会的门票。

en: She may not wait any longer.
She was as great a scientist as ever lived.
zh: 她是一位伟大的科学家，前无古人。

en: She had some trouble with him before.
zh: 她以前和他有过一些麻烦。

en: She said that she has never been there.
She doesn't know how to play golf.
She applied for the membership in a golf club.
zh: 她申请了高尔夫俱乐部的会员资格。

en: She smiled, not being able to help it.
She didn't even have the courtesy to say that she was sorry.
zh: 她甚至连一句道歉都没有说，真没礼貌。

en: She shook the rug to get the dust out of it.
zh: 她抖动地毯，把灰尘抖掉。

en: She shook the rug to get dust out of it.
zh: 她抖动地毯，把灰尘抖掉。

en: She is looked on as the leading authority on the subject.
zh: 她被认为是这个领域的主要权威。

en: She sent this book to me.
She emerged victorious in the struggle.
She doesn't have many friends in this town.
zh: 在这个镇上她没有很多朋友。

en: Does she work in this city?
She is a member of this organization.
She has this big room all to herself.
zh: 她独自拥有这间大房间。

en: She was loved by everybody in the village.
zh: 她被村里的每个人爱戴。

en: She lives in the village.
She has changed greatly since I last saw her.
zh: 自从我上次见到她以来，她变化很大。

en: It must be three years if a day since she was last in England.
zh: 她上次去英国一定有三年之久了。

en: Did she go to the concert last Sunday?
zh: 她上周日去听音乐会了吗？

en: She has been absent since last Wednesday.
zh: 她从上周三开始就没来上班了。

en: She arrived at the town last Monday.
She has been sick in bed since last Monday.
zh: 她从上周一开始就生病卧床。

en: She has lived with us since last summer.
zh: 她从去年夏天开始就和我们住在一起。

en: She must have visited England last summer.
zh: 她去年夏天一定去过英国。

en: Did she go to that concert?
zh: 她去听那场音乐会了吗？

en: She has made the same mistake as last time.
zh: 她犯了和上次一样的错误。

en: I think she is the kindest woman on earth.
zh: 我认为她是世界上最善良的女人。

en: They say she is the kindest woman on earth.
zh: 他们说她是世界上最善良的女人。

en: She was as happy as could be.
She is bored with this novel.
zh: 她对这本小说感到厌烦。

en: She is getting married this fall.
She is going to Sendai this spring.
She won't have this job much longer.
zh: 她不会再做这份工作很久了。

en: She is in partial agreement with this decision.
She can play this tune on the piano.
zh: 她可以用钢琴弹奏这首曲子。

en: She cannot work this machine.
She is used to handling this machine.
zh: 她习惯操作这台机器了。

en: She played an important part in this project.
zh: 她在这次项目中扮演了重要的角色。

en: She has been promoted twice since she joined this company.
zh: 自从她加入这家公司以来，她已经升职两次了。

en: She is contemplating visiting Europe this summer.
zh: 她正在考虑今年夏天去欧洲旅行。

en: She will without a doubt visit England this summer.
zh: 她今年夏天肯定会去英国。

en: There's no doubt that she'll visit England this summer.
zh: 毫无疑问，她今年夏天会去英国。

en: She must be visiting England this summer.
zh: 她肯定今年夏天会去英国。

en: She has a large office in this building.
zh: 她在这栋楼里有一个很大的办公室。

en: She may use this typewriter.
zh: 她可能会用这台打字机。

en: She felt herself flattered by this compliment.
zh: 她因这个赞美而感到受宠若惊。

en: She has been sick in bed for the last week.
zh: 她已经卧病在床一个星期了。

en: She knows many proverbs.
She seems to take immense pleasure in playing with children.
zh: 她似乎很喜欢和孩子们玩。

en: She likes word games.
She was careful not to break the glasses.
zh: 她小心翼翼，以免打碎杯子。

en: She has a great liking for rich foods.
zh: 她非常喜欢吃油腻的食物。

en: She needs our help.
She needs some help from us.
zh: 她需要我们的一些帮助。

en: She is bound to come here.
Did she come here to relax?
zh: 她来这里是为了放松吗？

en: She has a good many friends here.
She has a lot of friends here.
She seems happy to be here.
zh: 她似乎很高兴来到这里。

en: She buys few clothes here.
zh: 她在这里买的衣服很少。

en: She lives a few blocks away from here.
zh: 她住的地方离这里只有几个街区。

en: She has been on a diet for the past two months because she put on too much weight during the winter.
zh: 过去两个月她一直在节食，因为冬天的时候她长了太多肉。

en: She lost her temper at the slightest provocation.
She dresses smartly.
She promised to meet him at the coffee shop.
zh: 她答应在咖啡店和他见面。

en: She arranged to meet him at the coffee shop.
zh: 她安排在咖啡店和他见面。

en: She finished her coffee and asked for another.
zh: 她喝完了咖啡，又要了一杯。

en: She chatted with her friends about the football game over coffee.
zh: 她和朋友们一边喝咖啡一边聊足球比赛。

en: She stirred the milk into her coffee.
She put much sugar in the coffee.
zh: 她在咖啡里放了很多糖。

en: She put a lot of sugar in the coffee.
zh: 她在咖啡里放了很多糖。

en: She put lots of sugar in the coffee.
zh: 她在咖啡里放了很多糖。

en: She put on a coat.
She put on her coat and went out.
She got her coat and hat on.
She picked up a coin.
She graduated in German at Cambridge.
zh: 她毕业于剑桥大学的德语专业。

en: She is no ordinary singer.
zh: 她不是一个普通的歌手。

en: She is not at all a beauty, but she has an unspeakable charm.
zh: 她根本算不上漂亮，但她有一种说不出的魅力。

en: She is frugal, not to say stingy.
zh: 她很节俭，甚至可以说是吝啬。

en: She is very frugal, not to say stingy.
zh: 她非常节俭，甚至可以说是吝啬。

en: She cut a cake in two.
She cut the cake in two.
She divided the cake into five pieces.
She cut the cake into six pieces and gave one to each of the children.
zh: 她把蛋糕切成了六块，然后每人给孩子们一块。

en: She baked three cakes.
She wanted a piece of cake, but there was none left.
zh: 她想吃一块蛋糕，但是没有剩下任何蛋糕了。

en: She has a passion for cake.
She really likes cake.
She loves cake.
She likes cake a whole lot.
She is fond of cake.
She knows how to do the crawl.
I am not sure but she may come.
zh: 我不确定，但她可能会来。

en: She may come.
She might come.
She gave me a book for Christmas.
zh: 圣诞节她给了我一本书。

en: She wanted a doll for Christmas in the worst way.
zh: 她非常想要一个圣诞节的洋娃娃。

en: She left on Christmas Day.
zh: 她在圣诞节那天离开了。

en: She couldn't think what to give the children for Christmas.
zh: 她不知道圣诞节该给孩子们送什么。

en: At Christmas she went out of her way to buy me a really nice model plane.
zh: 圣诞节的时候，她特意给我买了一个非常好的模型飞机。

en: She wore a green dress.
zh: 她穿了一件绿色的连衣裙。

en: She was in a green coat and matching mini-skirt.
zh: 她穿着一件绿色外套和配套的迷你裙。

en: She was wearing a green coat with a matching mini-skirt.
zh: 她穿着一件绿色外套和配套的迷你裙。

en: She played that tune on her grand piano.
zh: 她用她的三角钢琴演奏了那首曲子。

en: She's a glamorous girl.
She is by far the best player in the club.
zh: 她是俱乐部里目前为止最好的球员。

en: She acted as leader of our club.
zh: 她担任我们俱乐部的领导。

en: She serves as the club treasurer.
zh: 她担任俱乐部财务主管。

en: She was looked up to by all the club members.
zh: 她受到所有俱乐部成员的尊敬。

en: She is due to speak for the class.
She is in harmony with all her classmates.
zh: 她和班里所有同学都相处得很融洽。

en: She married her classmate.
She is a credit to her class.
She runs fastest in our class.
zh: 她是我们班跑得最快的。

en: She was by far the best singer in the class.
zh: 她是班里迄今为止最好的歌手。

en: She is as bright as any in her class.
zh: 她和班里任何同学一样聪明。

en: She can sing better than anybody else in her class.
zh: 她比班里任何人都唱得好。

en: She studies as hard as any student in her class.
zh: 她和班里任何学生一样努力学习。

en: She is a better singer than any other student in her class.
zh: 她比班里其他任何学生都唱得好。

en: She filled the glass with wine.
zh: 她往玻璃杯里倒满了酒。

en: She is the happiest in her class.
She is at the top of her class.
She enjoys listening to classical music.
She shrieked whenever she saw a spider.
She likes Nara all the better because she can feel at home there.
zh: 她更喜欢奈良，因为她在那里能感到宾至如归。

en: She wears beautiful clothes.
She spread a beautiful cloth on a table.
zh: 她在桌子上铺了一块漂亮的布。

en: She picked up beautiful stones.
She was intelligent as well as beautiful.
She has even teeth.
She picked out three beautiful apples.
zh: 她挑了三个漂亮的苹果。

en: She has beautiful eyes.
She is not only pretty, but also bright.
She was right in the middle of cutting cucumbers.
She knows how to make candy.
She is a serious person.
She gave birth to a daughter yesterday.
She enjoyed herself very much at the party yesterday.
zh: 她昨天在派对上玩得很开心。

en: She flatly severed it.
She will not fail to abide by his promise.
zh: 她一定会遵守他的承诺。

en: She'll certainly keep the promise she made to him.
zh: 她一定会遵守她对他的承诺。

en: I'm sure she'll cause a stir in the Tokyo fashion world.
zh: 我相信她会在东京时尚界引起轰动。

en: We are not sure, but she is right.
zh: 我们不确定，但她是对的。

en: Certainly she is correct.
I'm sure that she's correct.
She's correct for sure.
I am sure of her success.
She'll succeed for sure.
She's sure to succeed.
She is certain to come on time.
She is bound to pass the examination.
She is certain to pass the exam.
I'm sure that she will not come to see you.
zh: 我确信她不会来看你的。

en: She is certain to be surprised.
I don't doubt but she will recover.
zh: 我毫不怀疑她会康复的。

en: For sure, she'll win the championship in the tournament.
zh: 她肯定会在比赛中赢得冠军。

en: She will surely be enjoying a hot bath at this hour.
zh: 她现在肯定在享受热水澡。

en: I don't doubt that she will come here.
zh: 我毫不怀疑她会来这里。

en: I'm sure she will come.
She is good at playing the guitar.
She plays the guitar.
She plays piano as well as the guitar.
zh: 她不但弹吉他，还弹钢琴。

en: She knows how to play the guitar.
She is singing with a guitar.
zh: 她一边唱歌一边弹吉他。

en: Can she play the guitar?
She searched her pockets for the key.
She quoted a poem by Keats.
zh: 她引用了济慈的一首诗。

en: She died of cancer.
She must have known that she had a cancer.
zh: 她一定知道自己得了癌症。

en: She is apt to lose her temper.
She got hot with rage.
She yelled in a rage.
She is pretty, and what is better, very kind.
zh: 她很漂亮，而且更好的是，她非常善良。

en: She has a lovely round face.
zh: 她有一张可爱圆润的脸。

en: She cared for the children out of charity.
zh: 她出于慈善心照顾孩子们。

en: She shed plentiful tears when her beloved dog was killed in an accident.
zh: 她心爱的狗在一次事故中丧生，她流下了大量的眼泪。

en: She wore a pretty hat.
zh: 她戴着一顶漂亮的帽子。

en: She is in a cute swimsuit.
zh: 她穿着一件可爱的泳衣。

en: Is she a pretty girl?
She is a pretty girl.
She has a pretty face.
She is not only pretty, but also kind.
She accepted him her suitor.
zh: 她接受了他这个求婚者。

en: She tried to dissuade him from participating in the project.
zh: 她试图劝阻他不要参与这个项目。

en: She comes from California.
She lives at the Gorilla Foundation in California.
zh: 她住在加州的大猩猩基金会。

en: She is all skin and bone.
She cut her finger on the broken glass.
zh: 她被碎玻璃割伤了手指。

en: She picked up one of the glass vases.
zh: 她拿起了一个玻璃花瓶。

en: She might be having coffee in the cafeteria.
zh: 她可能正在自助餐厅喝咖啡。

en: She's quite wealthy.
She has seen a lot of life.
She is given to drinking rather heavily.
She can speak English pretty well.
She has had quite a lot to drink.
She has quite a lot of clothes.
She is rather poor at tennis.
She is pretty bad at tennis.
She sang pretty well.
She played the piano well enough.
She thought of Canada as an ideal country to live in.
zh: 她认为加拿大是一个理想的居住国家。

en: She cannot be staying at this hotel, because she has gone back to Canada.
zh: 她不可能住在这家酒店，因为她已经回加拿大了。

en: She came from Canada to see me.
She smiled sadly.
She poured boiling water into the cup.
She poured milk into the cup.
She threw away the papers in a fit of temper.
zh: 她一怒之下把文件扔掉了。

en: She got into a rage.
She must have once been a real beauty.
She used to work for our company.
zh: 她以前在我们公司工作。

en: She used to play basketball.
She was a track star once.
She was at one time faced with the problem.
I think she was trying to pull a fast one.
She came home in low spirits.
She came home disappointed.
She came back disappointed.
It appears to me that she was wrong.
She came down with a cold.
She has finally recovered from her cold.
zh: 她终于从感冒中恢复过来了。

en: She put a kettle on the gas.
zh: 她把水壶放在煤气炉上烧水。

en: She refused to put up with her boisterous nephews anymore.
zh: 她再也无法忍受她那些吵闹的侄子们了。

en: She set the bird free from the cage.
zh: 她把鸟从笼子里放了出来。

en: She would value the opportunity to exchange views on the strength of guard-rails.
zh: 她很重视有机会就护栏的强度交流意见。

en: She curtained the windows.
She drew up the curtain.
She pulled the curtain aside.
She wasn't helping her mother.
She is less beautiful than her mother is.
She should help her mother.
She kissed her mother good night.
zh: 她吻了她妈妈，道了晚安。

en: She's as good a cook as her mother.
zh: 她和她妈妈一样擅长烹饪。

en: She is as beautiful as her mother is.
She is just as beautiful as her mother.
She went shopping with her mother.
zh: 她和她妈妈一起去购物了。

en: She helped her mother clean the house.
zh: 她帮她妈妈打扫了房子。

en: She asked me to stay till her mother came home.
zh: 她让我等到她妈妈回家。

en: She turns a deaf ear to her father.
zh: 她对她父亲的话置若罔闻。

en: She ate just as much meat as her father.
zh: 她吃的肉和她父亲一样多。

en: She finished her lunch quickly and went shopping.
zh: 她很快吃完午饭就去购物了。

en: She waited until the water boiled before making the tea with it.
zh: 她等到水开了才用它泡茶。

en: She was making tea.
She blew out all eight of her birthday candles.
zh: 她吹灭了她所有的八根生日蜡烛。

en: She is loaded with sex appeal.
zh: 她浑身散发着性感魅力。

en: As she's quit drinking, she's lost some weight.
zh: 自从她戒酒后，她瘦了一些。

en: She should model her manners on her sister.
zh: 她应该以她姐姐为榜样，学习她的礼仪。

en: She is no less pretty than her sister.
She is no less clever than her sister.
She is no less kind than her sister is.
She answered that she would visit me.
She can swim as fast as her brother.
zh: 她游泳的速度和她哥哥一样快。

en: She follows her brother wherever he goes.
zh: 她哥哥去哪儿她就跟到哪儿。

en: She must be well off.
While she is rich, she says she is poor.
zh: 虽然她很富有，但她说她很穷。

en: In spite of the fact that she's rich, she says she's poor.
zh: 尽管她很富有，但她说她很穷。

en: Even though she's rich, she says she's poor.
zh: 即使她很富有，但她说她很穷。

en: She gave money.
She devoted her money to social welfare.
zh: 她把她的钱奉献给了社会福利事业。

en: She worked hard in order to save money.
She puts aside a lot of money.
She put aside a lot of money.
She was careless with money, so now she's in trouble financially.
zh: 她花钱大手大脚，所以现在经济上遇到了麻烦。

en: She is hard up for money.
She complained continually that there was no money left.
zh: 她不停地抱怨说没钱了。

en: She is not without money.
She was very busy preparing dinner for her guests.
zh: 她忙着为客人准备晚餐。

en: She poured out tea for her visitors.
She likes oranges.
She tried to express juice from the orange.
She tried to squeeze the juice out of the orange.
zh: 她试图把橘子汁挤出来。

en: She tried to squeeze the juice from the orange.
She plans to stay at the Oriental Hotel.
She bought some meat and eggs so that she might make omelets.
zh: 她买了一些肉和鸡蛋，这样她就可以做煎蛋卷了。

en: She told me this story off the record.
zh: 她私下告诉我这个故事。

en: She stared at him with frightened eyes.
zh: 她用恐惧的眼神盯着他。

en: Aside from fright, she was not injured.
zh: 除了受到惊吓，她没有受伤。

en: She was named Elizabeth after her aunt.
zh: 她以她姑姑的名字命名为伊丽莎白。

en: She resembles her aunt.
She was brought up by her aunt.
She felt as if she had seen a ghost.
zh: 她感觉好像看到了鬼一样。

en: She is very attentive to her grandmother.
zh: 她对她的祖母非常体贴。

en: She led the old woman to the church by the hand.
zh: 她牵着老妇人的手领她去教堂。

en: She took the old woman's hand and led her to the church.
zh: 她握着老妇人的手，领她去教堂。

en: She strongly resembles her grandmother.
She was raised by her grandmother.
She ate candies one after another until she was completely full.
zh: 她一个接一个地吃糖，直到完全吃饱。

en: She has a gentle disposition.
She left for America the day before yesterday.
She was absorbed in reading a fairy tale.
zh: 她专心致志地读着童话故事。

en: She will have to be by herself during her stay at Oxford.
zh: 她在牛津期间将不得不独自一人。

en: It may be that she will succeed in the examination.
She'll almost certainly pass the test.
zh: 她几乎肯定会通过考试。

en: She's fashionable.
The chances are that she is still in bed.
I'm fed up with her chatter.
She has a loose tongue.
She likes talking best of all.
She spends her holidays at her uncle's.
She met her uncle.
She inclined her head in greeting.
She was brought up by her grandfather.
She has a funny face.
She looked at me in amusement.
She laughed in amusement.
She exploded with laughter.
She baked bread and cakes in the oven.
zh: 她在烤箱里烤面包和蛋糕。

en: She was stooping to take something out of the oven.
zh: 她弯腰从烤箱里拿东西。

en: She rides a motorcycle well.
She corresponds regularly with her pen pal in Australia.
zh: 她定期与她在澳大利亚的笔友通信。

en: She told me about what she saw in Australia.
zh: 她告诉了我她在澳大利亚看到的事情。

en: She keeps a parrot as a pet.
zh: 她养了一只鹦鹉当宠物。

en: She was sexually harassed in an elevator.
zh: 她在电梯里受到了性骚扰。

en: It was believed that she had graduated from Yale University.
zh: 人们认为她毕业于耶鲁大学。

en: She goes by the name of Amy.
She cried for joy.
She smiled happily.
She was beside herself with joy.
She was happy and sad all at once.
She succeeded in drawing the truth from him.
zh: 她成功地从他那里套出了真相。

en: She succeeded in getting him to tell the truth.
zh: 她成功地说服他说了实话。

en: She successfully got him to tell the truth.
zh: 她成功地让他说了实话。

en: She coaxed the letter out of her brother.
zh: 她哄骗她哥哥把信拿了出来。

en: She did not succeed, but after all that was her first attempt.
zh: 她没有成功，但毕竟那是她的第一次尝试。

en: Is she not a good French singer?
zh: 难道她不是一个优秀的法国歌手吗？

en: Isn't she a good French singer?
zh: 她难道不是一个优秀的法国歌手吗？

en: She answered with a nod.
She fell on her face.
This is the first time in a while that someone we had such high hopes for came to our department.
zh: 这是很久以来，第一个我们寄予厚望的人来到我们部门。

en: She never forgets to admire our baby.
zh: 她从不忘记赞美我们的宝宝。

en: She is inclined to take a nap.
She may have told a lie, but she didn't mean any harm.
zh: 她可能说了谎，但她没有恶意。

en: She is above telling a lie.
She can even tell lies!
She must have told a lie.
She was accused of telling a lie.
My belief is that she has never told a lie.
I believe that she has never told a lie.
She lost her job because of her careless remark.
zh: 她因为粗心大意的话而失去了工作。

en: She was clothed in wool.
She was dressed in wool.
She is said to be a leader in the women's liberation movement.
zh: 据说她是妇女解放运动的领导人。

en: She is down with influenza.
She is living in some village in India.
zh: 她住在印度的某个村庄。

en: She wanted to have paid a visit to India.
She is well known in both India and China.
zh: 她在印度和中国都很有名。

en: She is not only well known in India, but is also well known in China.
zh: 她不仅在印度很有名，在中国也很有名。

en: She is pursuing her career in interior design.
zh: 她正在从事室内设计事业。

en: She committed false acts.
She came up with a good way of making money by using the Internet.
zh: 她想出了一个利用互联网赚钱的好方法。

en: She thought of a good way to make money on the Internet.
zh: 她想到了一个在互联网上赚钱的好方法。

en: She stirred the instant coffee and poured in milk.
zh: 她搅拌了速溶咖啡，然后倒入牛奶。

en: She spilt ink on the desk.
zh: 她把墨水洒在了桌子上。

en: She was asked to write her name in ink.
zh: 她被要求用墨水写下她的名字。

en: She is what is called a baseball widow.
zh: 她就是所谓的棒球寡妇。

en: She is what we call a bookworm.
zh: 她就是我们所说的书呆子。

en: She is a so-called bookworm.
zh: 她是一个所谓的书呆子。

en: She is what is called a genius.
She is, so to speak, a walking dictionary.
zh: 她可以算得上是一本活字典。

en: She is what we call a talented woman.
zh: 她就是我们所说的才女。

en: She is what is called a woman of culture.
zh: 她就是所谓的文化女性。

en: She is what is called a learned fool.
zh: 她就是人们所说的学问渊博的傻瓜。

en: She is, as it were, a walking speaker.
zh: 她简直就是一个活生生的演说家。

en: She was, so to speak, our idol.
zh: 她可以这么说，是我们的偶像。

en: She was similar to me in many ways.
zh: 她在很多方面都和我相似。

en: She kept various kinds of pets.
zh: 她养了各种各样的宠物。

en: I was lonely without her.
She lives in the country.
She was envious of her cousin's success.
She planned a birthday dinner for her cousin.
zh: 她为她的表妹计划了一个生日晚宴。

en: She was at a loss when to start.
When did she get married?
When did she leave the classroom?
zh: 她什么时候离开教室的？

en: When will she return home?
She is always complaining of one thing or another.
She always wears fashionable clothes.
zh: 她总是穿着时髦的衣服。

en: She is always cheerful and smiling.
zh: 她总是那么快乐，面带微笑。

en: She is always cheerful.
She always has her hair done by a famous hairdresser.
zh: 她总是请一位著名的发型师为她做头发。

en: She always keeps her word.
She always keeps her promises.
She always wears striking clothes.
zh: 她总是穿着引人注目的衣服。

en: She always gets lost.
She always carries a charm against evil.
zh: 她总是带着辟邪的护身符。

en: She is always forgetting my phone number.
zh: 她总是忘记我的电话号码。

en: She's always finding fault with me.
She was always finding fault with me.
She's always short with me.
She always expects me to help her.
She is always busy.
She always walks to school.
She usually walks to school.
She always keeps her room in good order.
zh: 她总是把房间整理得井井有条。

en: She always keeps her room clean.
zh: 她总是把房间打扫得很干净。

en: She is always complaining of her husband's small salary.
zh: 她总是抱怨她丈夫的工资低。

en: She was always complaining about her husband.
She was always been easy to get along with.
She always yielded to his opinion.
She always interferes with him.
She is always finding fault with him.
She always looks like she's half-asleep, but once she gets into an argument, she really goes to town.
zh: 她总是看起来半睡不醒的样子，但一旦和人争论起来，她就滔滔不绝。

en: She always keeps her hair clean.
She is always cold-hearted.
She always takes good care of her old father.
zh: 她总是很好地照顾她年迈的父亲。

en: She is always hard at work.
She always keeps the garden.
She always speaks in a low voice.
She is always punctual in coming.
She is always complaining of her poor health.
zh: 她总是抱怨自己身体不好。

en: She always writes down every word her teacher says.
zh: 她总是把老师说的每一句话都记下来。

en: She always looks pale.
She always carries the Holy Bible about.
She always carries a Bible.
She always boasts of being a good swimmer.
zh: 她总是吹嘘自己游泳技术好。

en: She always speaks ill of others.
She always has some axe to grind.
She is always fishing for compliments.
zh: 她总是想博取别人的赞美。

en: She was always quarreling with her parents.
She always has a serious look on her face.
She always adapted to new circumstances.
zh: 她总是能适应新的环境。

en: She always clears the table after a meal.
She's always complaining about the food.
She always sweeps the floor clean.
zh: 她总是把地板打扫得干干净净。

en: She is always playing favorites with a few students but very strict with everyone else.
zh: 她总是偏袒少数几个学生，但对其他人却非常严格。

en: She is constantly writing letters.
She always winds up a conversation with a wave of her hand.
She always gets her own way.
She always lets her children do what they want to.
zh: 她总是让孩子们为所欲为。

en: She is always complaining of her job.
She always prides herself on her academic background.
zh: 她总是以她的学历为荣。

en: She is always full of her own affairs.
zh: 她总是满脑子都是自己的事。

en: She thinks that she's always right.
She always stood by me.
She always turns a deaf ear to my advice.
zh: 她总是对我的建议充耳不闻。

en: She always cared about my health.
She is always complaining about my small salary.
She always smiles at me.
She always reminds me of her mother.
zh: 她总是让我想起她的妈妈。

en: She always gives me the cold shoulder.
zh: 她总是对我爱理不理的。

en: Whenever she sees me, she greets me politely.
zh: 每次她看到我，都会礼貌地跟我打招呼。

en: She always takes care of her children.
zh: 她总是照顾她的孩子们。

en: She is always dressed in black.
She was always surrounded by high-quality goods.
zh: 她总是被高档商品包围着。

en: She is always buying expensive clothes.
She always buys expensive clothes.
She always wears too much scent.
She always boasts of her luck.
zh: 她总是吹嘘她的好运气。

en: She always looked, but never was, happy.
zh: 她总是看起来很快乐，但实际上并不快乐。

en: She always looked happy, but never was.
zh: 她总是看起来很快乐，但实际上并不快乐。

en: She always looks happy.
She always looked happy, but in fact she'd never once had anything to be happy about.
zh: 她总是看起来很快乐，但事实上她从来没有任何值得高兴的事情。

en: She always looked happy.
She is always free in the afternoon.
She is always complaining about something or other.
zh: 她总是抱怨这抱怨那的。

en: She is always clothed in silk.
She always walks with a light step.
She was always quarreling with her brothers.
zh: 她总是和她的兄弟们吵架。

en: She's always looking at herself in the mirror - What vanity.
zh: 她总是照镜子——真是虚荣。

en: She's always putting on airs.
She's always putting on airs, acting as if she were a queen.
zh: 她总是摆架子，装得好像她是个女王一样。

en: She's always putting on airs, acting as if she were Queen.
zh: 她总是摆架子，装得好像她是个女王一样。

en: I don't like her, because she always puts on airs.
zh: 我不喜欢她，因为她总是摆架子。

en: She is always bright and smiling.
She always tries something new.
She is always confusing salt with sugar.
She always speaks in English.
She spent more money than usual.
She always works hard.
She always buys milk.
She is always missing the ball.
She usually wears jeans.
She arrived late as usual.
She is always kind to everyone.
zh: 她总是对每个人都很友善。

en: Does she always go there?
It is always the case with her.
She was talking all the time.
She is always neatly dressed.
She is always at the bottom of the class.
She always takes her grandmother for a walk.
zh: 她总是带她奶奶去散步。

en: She is always well made up.
Don't believe her because she always lies.
zh: 别相信她，因为她总是撒谎。

en: She always gets up at six.
She cherishes a hope that she will be a singer some day.
zh: 她怀揣着有一天能成为歌手的希望。

en: She always buys nothing but the best of everything.
zh: 她总是只买最好的东西。

en: Once she starts talking, she is hard to stop.
zh: 她一旦开始说话，就很难停下来。

en: She always has to be the one giving orders.
zh: 她总是要发号施令的那个人。

en: I wonder where she lives.
When did she break the window?
zh: 她什么时候打破窗户的？

en: She will probably marry one day.
How long has she been sick?
She is going to climb that mountain someday.
zh: 她总有一天会去爬那座山的。

en: She likes strawberries and her sister apples.
zh: 她喜欢草莓，她妹妹喜欢苹果。

en: She went to Italy to learn Italian.
zh: 她去意大利学习意大利语。

en: She has gone to Italy.
She must come at all events.
She was a rather prim and proper young lady.
zh: 她是一位相当拘谨的年轻女士。

en: She was feeling kind of tired.
She ended off her speech with some jokes.
zh: 她以一些笑话结束了她的演讲。

en: She looked at several dresses and decided on the most expensive one.
zh: 她看了几件连衣裙，然后决定买最贵的那件。

en: She loves an old table made in England.
zh: 她喜欢一张英国制造的旧桌子。

en: She failed in her attempt to swim the Channel.
zh: 她试图游泳横渡英吉利海峡，但失败了。

en: She majors in medicine.
She makes a good living.
A good idea struck her.
zh: 她突然有了一个好主意。

en: She thought of a good plan.
She thought of a good solution.
zh: 她想到了一个好的解决方案。

en: For all her riches she is not happy.
zh: 尽管她很富有，但她并不快乐。

en: She ought to have known better than to say that.
zh: 她本应该知道不该说那样的话。

en: She has an eye for antiques.
She flung her clothes on.
She made herself useful about the room.
zh: 她在房间里做些力所能及的事情。

en: She did not come for a certain reason.
She went from one shop to another.
zh: 她从一家店逛到另一家店。

en: She accepted the proposal to a certain degree.
zh: 她在某种程度上接受了这项提议。

en: She can be trusted to some degree.
zh: 她在某种程度上是值得信任的。

en: She speaks Japanese to some extent.
She resembles a popular singer.
zh: 她长得像一位受欢迎的歌手。

en: She was borne away by an impulse.
She is a kind of genius.
She turned to her writing of poetry, as a kind of consolation.
zh: 她转向诗歌创作，作为一种慰藉。

en: She works as a secretary in an office.
She drowned herself in some lake.
She is engaged to a rich man.
She is addicted to alcohol.
She's an alcoholic.
She keeps company with a foreign student.
zh: 她和一个外国留学生交往。

en: She bowed in thanks.
She incarnates all womanly virtues.
zh: 她是所有女性美德的化身。

en: She was depressed by all her problems.
zh: 她因所有问题而感到沮丧。

en: She takes after her mother in every respect.
She has caught up with you in every respect.
She availed herself of every opportunity.
She knew to an inch where everything should be.
zh: 她对每件东西应该放在哪里都了如指掌。

en: She speaks a little Arabic.
She takes everything for granted.
zh: 她认为一切都是理所当然的。

en: She was nearly hit by a bicycle.
She has been busy preparing for her trip to the U.S.
zh: 她一直在忙着准备去美国的旅行。

en: She has made up her mind to go to the States to study.
zh: 她已经下定决心去美国留学了。

en: She was born in America and grew up in Japan.
zh: 她出生在美国，在日本长大。

en: She was born in the United States and grew up in Japan.
zh: 她出生在美国，在日本长大。

en: She was proud that she had shaken hands with the President of the U.S.
zh: 她很自豪能和美国总统握手。

en: She is married to an American.
She is American, but she lives in England.
zh: 她是美国人，但她住在英国。

en: She is of American parentage.
She has made up her mind to go to America to study.
zh: 她已经下定决心去美国留学了。

en: She works for a large American corporation.
zh: 她在一家大型美国公司工作。

en: She has gone to America.
She made up her mind to go to America.
She has been busy preparing for her trip to the USA.
zh: 她一直在忙着准备去美国的旅行。

en: She has decided to live in America for good.
zh: 她已经决定永远住在美国了。

en: She has not a few friends in America.
She has many friends in the United States.
She was so preoccupied that she was oblivious of her surroundings.
zh: 她太专注了，以至于没有注意到周围的环境。

en: She is not very well off.
She can't play the piano very well.
She didn't take many photos.
I don't particularly like her.
She does not have many friends in Kyoto.
zh: 她在京都没有多少朋友。

en: She cried till her eyes dried.
She cried until she ran out of tears.
I don't think she cares very much.
She doesn't get outdoors much.
Such was her anger that she was lost for words.
zh: 她非常生气，以至于说不出话来。

en: She went in for too many events, and so won none.
zh: 她参加了太多的项目，结果一个都没赢。

en: She has too many boyfriends.
She doesn't talk much, but once she does speak she is eloquent.
zh: 她不常说话，但一旦开口，就口若悬河。

en: She does not have much money.
She devoted herself to mission work in Africa.
zh: 她献身于非洲的传教工作。

en: She shared the apartment with her friends.
zh: 她和她的朋友们合租公寓。

en: She swears by that brand.
She looks beautiful in that dress.
zh: 她穿那件连衣裙真漂亮。

en: She sympathized with those unfortunate people.
She has already lived in that town for five years.
zh: 她已经在那个镇上住了五年了。

en: She resembles that actress.
She'd better tame that violent temper.
zh: 她最好控制一下她那暴躁的脾气。

en: She is connected with that company.
She kept body and soul together in such days.
zh: 在那样的日子里，她勉强维持生计。

en: I wonder if she is staying at that hotel.
zh: 我想知道她是不是住在那个酒店。

en: She is making use of you.
She seems to hate you.
It seems she hates you.
I doubt that she loves you.
She is more famous than you.
She might be taller than you.
She is more human in thinking than you.
zh: 她在思考方面比你更有人情味。

en: She is two years senior to you.
She is less intelligent than you.
Is she your sister?
Does she know your phone number?
zh: 她知道你的电话号码吗？

en: Does she know your telephone number?
zh: 她知道你的电话号码吗？

en: She will be able to answer your question.
She stayed up late to finish sewing your dress.
zh: 她熬夜把你的裙子缝完了。

en: She is mad at you.
She waited for you for two hours.
Is she your mother?
Is that your mom?
She asked me to continue writing to your father.
zh: 她让我继续给你父亲写信。

en: She'll lend you a book.
She regrets having been rude to you.
What did she whisper to you?
She is anxious to meet you.
She bore no malice against you.
She'll be glad to see you, won't she?
zh: 她会很高兴见到你的，不是吗？

en: She's about the same height as you.
She was delighted with the flowers you sent her.
zh: 她对你送给她的花感到很高兴。

en: She has the same bag as you have.
She talked childishly.
She need not have owned up to her faults.
zh: 她本不必承认她的错误。

en: She did not need to own up to her faults.
zh: 她不需要承认她的错误。

en: She answered easily.
She went to this shop and that.
zh: 她去了这家店和那家店。

en: She went from place to place in search of him.
She walked around looking for him.
She did nothing but look around.
zh: 她什么也不做，只是四处张望。

en: She left here with haste.
zh: 她匆匆忙忙地离开了这里。

en: She left here in a hurry.
She looked as if she had seen a ghost.
zh: 她看起来好像见了鬼一样。

en: She's paid her dues working there for years.
zh: 她在那里工作多年，已经付出了应有的代价。

en: She was laughed at.
She put her assistants to work assembling evidence.
zh: 她让她的助手们去收集证据。

en: She is frank in speech.
She speaks frankly.
She reconciled herself to living there.
zh: 她接受了在那里生活的事实。

en: She stammers when she feels nervous.
She is a total stranger to me.
zh: 她对我来说完全是个陌生人。

en: She won an Oscar nomination for best supporting actress.
zh: 她获得了奥斯卡最佳女配角提名。

en: She blew her lines.
She dared to ask for the results of the exams.
zh: 她大胆地要求查看考试成绩。

en: She is precise in keeping appointments.
She gave a vague answer.
zh: 她给了一个含糊的回答。

en: While skating at the ice rink she fell on her rear.
zh: 在溜冰场滑冰时，她摔了个屁股墩儿。

en: She has liking for ice cream.
She likes ice cream.
She's wearing eye shadow.
She works as an office lady.
She stared at a UFO in silence.
zh: 她默默地盯着一个不明飞行物。

en: She told me that she had bought a CD.
She put her CDs in a row on the shelf.
zh: 她把她的CD排成一排放在架子上。

en: She promised her mother to come home before nine without fail.
zh: 她答应她妈妈一定在九点之前回家。

en: She works from nine.
She had a happy marriage with a teacher in September.
zh: 她在九月和一个老师幸福地结婚了。

en: She lived to be ninety.
She has eight dogs. That's quite a few.
She was in the eighth grade.
She came back before eight.
She did not come down until 8:00.
She came down to breakfast at eight.
She came down for breakfast at eight.
She began writing a report at eight, finishing it at twelve.
zh: 她八点开始写报告，十二点完成。

en: She started dancing when she was eight.
She attained the age of eighty one.
She turned eighty-one.
She is now eighty-one years old.
She must be over eighty.
She has no less than seven sons.
She may have missed the 7:00 train.
zh: 她可能错过了七点的火车。

en: She got home at seven.
It looks like she made seven mistakes in as many lines.
zh: 看起来她在这么几行里犯了七个错误。

en: She was born at six a.m. on July 17.
zh: 她七月十七日早上六点出生。

en: She laid the table for six.
zh: 她摆好了六人份的餐具。

en: She did not return till six.
I expect her back by six o'clock.
zh: 我希望她六点之前回来。

en: She will come back from school by six o'clock.
zh: 她六点之前会从学校回来。

en: He made six mistakes in as many lines.
zh: 他在几行字里就犯了六个错误。

en: She is expecting a baby in June.
She is going to marry Mr Johnson on June 4.
zh: 她将于六月四日和约翰逊先生结婚。

en: She's going to get married to Mr. Johnson on June 4th.
zh: 她将于六月四日和约翰逊先生结婚。

en: She made a tour of America, stopping in six cities.
zh: 她在美国做了一次旅行，在六个城市停留。

en: I should think she is over sixty.
zh: 我估计她有六十多岁了。

en: She left home five years ago, and has never been heard of since.
zh: 她五年前离家出走，从此杳无音信。

en: She came home for the first time in five years.
She has been absent from school for five days.
She's been absent from school for five days.
She was obliged to work to support five children.
zh: 她不得不工作来养活五个孩子。

en: She has brought up five children.
She got through her work before five.
zh: 她在五点之前完成了工作。

en: She won't be back till five.
Will she come home at five?
She came back soon after five o'clock.
zh: 她五点过后不久就回来了。

en: She went down to the fifth floor.
She is 5 feet 5, but appears taller.
zh: 她身高五英尺五英寸，但看起来更高。

en: She made five mistakes in as many lines.
zh: 她在几行字里就犯了五个错误。

en: She had lived in five different countries.
zh: 她曾在五个不同的国家居住过。

en: She takes care of fifty odd children.
She rented a four-room apartment.
zh: 她租了一套四室的公寓。

en: She'll be available around four o'clock.
I think she'll be able to answer the phone around 4:00.
zh: 我觉得她大概四点左右能接电话。

en: She watches television from four to six.
zh: 她从四点到六点看电视。

en: She could read when she was four.
zh: 她四岁的时候就能读书了。

en: She married again in her mid-forties.
zh: 她在四十多岁的时候再婚了。

en: She remarried when she was in her mid-forties.
zh: 她在四十多岁的时候再婚了。

en: She was forty, but she appeared older.
zh: 她四十岁了，但看起来更老。

en: I guess that she is 40.
She must be forty or so.
She got a master's degree three years ago.
zh: 她三年前获得了硕士学位。

en: She got her master's degree three years ago.
zh: 她三年前获得了硕士学位。

en: She has kept a diary for 3 years.
She depended on her uncle for her school expenses for three years.
zh: 她靠她叔叔支付了三年的学费。

en: She said that she had been prepared for the examination for three days.
zh: 她说她已经为考试准备了三天。

en: She tried a third time.
She has been watching television for three hours.
zh: 她看电视已经三个小时了。

en: She promised me that she would come at three.
She lost her father at the age of 3.
She can speak three foreign languages.
She can speak three languages.
She said that she had met him three months before.
zh: 她说她三个月前见过他。

en: She is thirty-one.
She has been waiting for him thirty minutes.
zh: 她等他已经三十分钟了。

en: I should think she is under thirty.
zh: 我觉得她应该不到三十岁。

en: She was across in thirty minutes.
She got to the other side in 30 minutes.
zh: 她三十分钟就到了另一边。
